CustomField.description: Calculates number of days (rounded down) that remains for Client Claim to be solved
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'ClientClaim', NOT( ISBLANK( ReceivedDate__c) ) ), TEXT( FLOOR( ReceivedDate__c + 30 - NOW() ) ) & " d " & TEXT( ABS( MFLOOR( MOD( ( ReceivedDate__c + 30 - NOW() ) * 24, 24) ) ) ) & " h", null )
CustomField.label: Remaining Time
